en-us: Choose Final Cut Pro X Title Template(.fcpxml)
zh-hk: 匯入Final Cut Pro X標題樣式(.fcpxml)
zh-cn: 导入Final Cut Pro X标题样式(.fcpxml)

en-us: Choose Final Cut Pro 7 Title Template(.xml)
zh-hk: 匯入Final Cut Pro 7標題樣式(.xml)
zh-cn: 导入Final Cut Pro 7标题样式(.xml)

en-us: Fill some info of your video
Press ⌘+S and save as 1.xml in the next page!
Press ⌘+S and save as 1.fcpxml in the next page!
Press ⌘+S and save as 1.zip in the next page!
Remove runctuations(and turn comma,periods etc. to space)
zh-hk: 移除標點符號(並把逗號句號等變為空格)
zh-cn: 移除标点符号(并把逗号句号等变为空格)

en-us: Remove runctuations(and turn comma,periods etc. to new line)
zh-hk: 移除標點符號(並把逗號句號等變為換行)
zh-cn: 移除标点符号(并把逗号句号等变为換行)

zh-hk: 匯入文字或字幕檔案轉換
zh-cn: 导入文本或字幕档案转换

en-us: Save before leave or changes will lost!
zh-hk: 離開前任何未儲存之變更將流失
zh-cn: 离开前任何未保存之变更将流失
